bodyV2.markdown:
Matilda The Musical is 2 hours 40 minutes (incl. interval). Matinee performances starting at 2pm finish at approx. 4:40pm. Weekly nightly performances beginning at 7pm finish around 9:40pm. On Saturday's matinee performances commence at 2:30pm meaning a finish time of 5:10pm, while the evening start time of 7:30pm results in an end time of 10:10pm. Lastly on Sundays there's only one performance time of 3pm giving a finish time of 5:40pm.Â 

Book Tickets

content.name: How long is Matilda The Musical and when does it finish?
